typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (movieid as string, title as string, genres as string[], year as string, rating as string),
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[],
		title as string,
		year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AvroSource
AvroSource derive(column1 = ['tite'->title,'year'->year]) ~> AddMapType
AddMapType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['moviemap.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
